3.description: Sixteen-year-old wizard picked up by Dumbledore from the Dursleys. Learning about Voldemort's past.

9.description: Excels in Potions using an old textbook annotated by 'The Half-Blood Prince.' Becomes Slughorn's favorite.

13.description: Learning about Voldemort's transformation into a dark wizard through Dumbledore's pensieve memories.

23.description: Learns about Horcruxes and Voldemort's quest for immortality. Understands the magnitude of the task ahead.

27.description: Accompanies Dumbledore to retrieve a Horcrux from a dangerous cave filled with Inferi.

29.description: Witnesses Dumbledore's death at Snape's hands. Discovers the locket Horcrux was a fake.

4.description: Hogwarts Headmaster recruiting Horace Slughorn to return as Potions Master. Shows a blackened, withered hand.

10.description: Begins showing Harry memories of Voldemort's past, starting with his childhood at the orphanage.

23.description: Explains Horcruxes to Harry and reveals Voldemort split his soul into seven pieces for immortality.

relationships.Voldemort: Enemy whose Horcruxes must be destroyed

27.description: Weakened by drinking potion protecting the Horcrux. Shows vulnerability for the first time.

29.description: Killed by Severus Snape atop the Astronomy Tower. His death leaves Harry to complete the mission alone.

2.description: Makes an Unbreakable Vow with Narcissa Malfoy to protect Draco and complete his mission if necessary.

8.description: Finally achieves his ambition to teach Defense Against the Dark Arts, replacing Umbridge.

28.description: Revealed to be the Half-Blood Prince whose textbook helped Harry excel in Potions.

relationships.Lily Evans: Mother whose maiden name was Prince

29.description: Kills Dumbledore with the Killing Curse and flees Hogwarts with Draco and Death Eaters.

6.description: Sixth-year student acting suspiciously at Borgin and Burkes. Seems to be on a secret mission.

15.description: Responsible for cursing Katie Bell and nearly poisoning Ron, trying to kill Dumbledore indirectly.

27.description: Successfully allows Death Eaters into Hogwarts through a Vanishing Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

29.description: Disarms Dumbledore atop the Astronomy Tower but cannot bring himself to kill him.

4.description: Former Hogwarts professor convinced to return as Potions Master. Collector of talented students.

8.description: Forms the Slug Club of well-connected students. Clearly favors those with famous or influential connections.

17.description: Reveals he told Tom Riddle about Horcruxes when he was a student, feeling ashamed of his role.

23.description: Gives Harry the true memory of telling Tom Riddle about Horcruxes, revealing Voldemort's plan for seven.

10.description: Eleven-year-old boy at Wool's Orphanage, already showing signs of cruelty and magical ability.

13.description: Hogwarts student charming teachers but secretly opening the Chamber of Secrets and framing Hagrid.

17.description: Learns about Horcruxes from Slughorn and begins planning to split his soul for immortality.

20.description: Returns to Hogwarts years later as an adult, asking Dumbledore for the Defense Against the Dark Arts position.

23.description: Revealed to have created multiple Horcruxes, splitting his soul into seven pieces to become immortal.

14.description: Fifth-year student dating Dean Thomas but clearly still has feelings for Harry.

24.description: Finally gets together with Harry after a Quidditch victory. Their relationship becomes serious quickly.

30.description: Heartbroken when Harry breaks up with her to protect her from Voldemort's vengeance.

2.description: Draco's mother, desperate to protect her son from Voldemort's dangerous mission. Makes Snape vow to help.
Death Eater and Narcissa's sister, suspicious of Snape's loyalty to Voldemort.

29.description: Among the Death Eaters who infiltrate Hogwarts. Witnesses Snape killing Dumbledore.

11.description: Sixth-year student struggling in Potions while Harry excels with the Prince's book. Feeling overshadowed.

15.description: Poisoned by mead intended for Dumbledore. Saved by Harry's quick thinking with a bezoar.

18.description: Dating Lavender Brown but still has feelings for Hermione, causing romantic tension.

9.description: Suspicious of Harry's sudden success in Potions. Correctly suspects he's getting help from somewhere.

18.description: Jealous of Ron's relationship with Lavender Brown. Attacks Ron with birds when upset.

29.description: Fights Death Eaters during the invasion of Hogwarts. Shows her loyalty and bravery.

11.description: Gryffindor sixth-year student who becomes romantically interested in Ron Weasley.

14.description: Begins dating Ron Weasley, much to Hermione's dismay. Very affectionate and possessive.

11.description: Gryffindor sixth-year student who plays on the Quidditch team as a Chaser.

14.description: Dating Ginny Weasley, though their relationship has its ups and downs.

24.description: Breaks up with Ginny, freeing her to pursue a relationship with Harry.

7.description: Gryffindor sixth-year student, still clumsy but showing more confidence than in previous years.

11.description: Invited to Slughorn's Slug Club meetings due to his parents' heroic reputation.

29.description: Fights bravely against Death Eaters during the invasion of Hogwarts.

7.description: Ravenclaw fifth-year student known for her eccentric beliefs and dreamy manner.

8.description: Invited to Slughorn's Christmas party, showing she has some social standing despite her oddness.

29.description: Fights alongside Harry and friends against Death Eaters during the Hogwarts invasion.

7.description: Slytherin sixth-year student, tall and handsome with an arrogant manner.

8.description: Member of Slughorn's Slug Club, likely due to his mother's notorious reputation.
Gryffindor seventh-year student, arrogant and boastful. Member of Slughorn's Slug Club.

11.description: Tries out for Gryffindor Quidditch team as Keeper, competing with Ron Weasley.

19.description: Plays as Keeper when Ron is in the hospital wing, but his arrogance causes team problems.

8.description: Ravenclaw student invited to Slughorn's party due to his connection to Damocles Belby.

11.description: Gryffindor seventh-year student and Chaser on the Quidditch team.

12.description: Cursed by a necklace while on a trip to Hogsmeade. Nearly killed by the Dark Magic.

28.description: Returns to Hogwarts after recovering from the cursed necklace, ready to rejoin the Quidditch team.

7.description: Transfiguration Professor and Head of Gryffindor House, concerned about student safety with Voldemort's return.

29.description: Fights Death Eaters during the invasion of Hogwarts, defending the school alongside students.

30.description: Takes charge of Hogwarts arrangements after Dumbledore's death, showing strong leadership.

8.description: Keeper of Keys and Grounds, Care of Magical Creatures teacher. Devastated by Dumbledore's absence.

16.description: Returns to Hogwarts after being away, sporting injuries from his mission for Dumbledore.

30.description: Deeply mourns Dumbledore's death at the funeral, showing the depth of their bond.

5.description: Former Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, now working for the Order of the Phoenix.

29.description: Fights Death Eaters during the invasion of Hogwarts, arriving to help defend the school.

5.description: Metamorphmagus and Auror, member of the Order of the Phoenix. Seems subdued and unlike her usual cheerful self.

29.description: Fights Death Eaters at Hogwarts, showing her loyalty to the cause despite personal troubles.

5.description: Ministry employee and Order member, working against Voldemort from within the government.

16.description: Continues his dangerous work for the Order while maintaining his Ministry position.

5.description: Devoted mother and Order member, fiercely protective of her family and Harry.

16.description: Worried about her family's safety as the war escalates, especially with Bill's dangerous work.

5.description: Eldest Weasley son, curse-breaker for Gringotts and Order member. Engaged to Fleur Delacour.

29.description: Attacked by Fenrir Greyback during the Hogwarts invasion, severely scarred but not fully transformed.

5.description: Former Triwizard champion, part-Veela witch engaged to Bill Weasley.

29.description: Shows true love for Bill by insisting she still wants to marry him despite his werewolf scars.

1.description: Former Minister for Magic, recently removed from office due to his handling of Voldemort's return.
New Minister for Magic, former Auror with a tough reputation. Taking a harder line against Voldemort.

16.description: Visits Harry at the Burrow, trying to recruit him as a spokesperson for the Ministry.

3.description: Third Weasley son, ambitious Ministry employee who has estranged himself from his family over politics.

16.description: Accompanies Scrimgeour to the Burrow, trying to reconcile with his family while still supporting the Ministry.
Savage werewolf who attacks children. Not officially a Death Eater but allies with Voldemort.

29.description: Attacks Bill Weasley during the invasion of Hogwarts, scarring him permanently.
Death Eater who participates in the invasion of Hogwarts alongside his sister.
Death Eater who participates in the invasion of Hogwarts alongside her brother.

10.description: Witch from the impoverished Gaunt family, daughter of Marvolo Gaunt. Lives in squalor and fear.

13.description: Tom Riddle's mother who used a love potion to enchant Tom Riddle Sr., then died in childbirth.

10.description: Violent pure-blood wizard, patriarch of the Gaunt family. Obsessed with his ancestry and blood status.
Violent wizard, son of Marvolo Gaunt and brother to Merope. Speaks Parseltongue and attacks Muggles.

17.description: Framed by Tom Riddle for the murder of the Riddle family, spent years in Azkaban for a crime he didn't commit.

20.description: Wealthy elderly witch who collected rare magical artifacts, including Helga Hufflepuff's cup and Salazar Slytherin's locket.

13.description: Co-owner of Borgin and Burkes, dealer in Dark Arts artifacts. Employed young Tom Riddle.

20.description: Reveals how Tom Riddle charmed Hepzibah Smith to acquire her valuable magical artifacts.

10.description: Matron of Wool's Orphanage where Tom Riddle grew up. Tells Dumbledore about Tom's disturbing behavior.

6.description: Owner of Borgin and Burkes Dark Arts shop, nervous around Draco Malfoy who seems to be threatening him.

12.description: Landlady of the Three Broomsticks pub in Hogsmeade, popular with Hogwarts students and staff.

27.description: Under the Imperius Curse, forced to help Draco Malfoy by giving Katie Bell the cursed necklace.

7.description: Gryffindor sixth-year student, Harry's dorm mate with a tendency toward magical accidents.

29.description: Fights against Death Eaters during the invasion of Hogwarts, showing his courage.

7.description: Gryffindor sixth-year student, twin sister to Padma Patil in Ravenclaw.
Ravenclaw sixth-year student, twin sister to Parvati Patil in Gryffindor.

8.description: Herbology Professor and Head of Hufflepuff House, expert in magical plants.

29.description: Fights alongside other professors to defend Hogwarts during the Death Eater invasion.

8.description: Charms Professor and Head of Ravenclaw House, small in stature but skilled in magic.

29.description: Joins the battle against Death Eaters, using his considerable magical skills to defend the school.

10.description: Handsome Muggle from the village of Little Hangleton, enchanted by Merope Gaunt with a love potion.

17.description: Murdered by his own son Tom Riddle along with his parents when Voldemort returned to Little Hangleton.

20.description: Hepzibah Smith's devoted house-elf, framed for her murder by Tom Riddle.

recaps.1: The Muggle Prime Minister meets the Minister for Magic, who updates him on the rise of dark magic. News of attacks and disappearances spreads fear.
recaps.2: Snape hosts Narcissa Malfoy and Bellatrix Lestrange at his home. Snape makes an unbreakable vow to help Draco with a mysterious mission.
recaps.3: Dumbledore collects Harry from the Dursleys and warns them to treat him better. He takes Harry on a visit before heading to the Burrow.
recaps.4: Dumbledore and Harry visit Horace Slughorn, convincing him to return to Hogwarts as Potions Master. Harry notices Slughorn's fondness for collecting well-connected students.
recaps.5: Harry reunites with the Weasleys at the Burrow. The group discusses Voldemort's growing threat and the danger facing the wizarding world.
recaps.6: At Diagon Alley, Harry sees Draco Malfoy acting suspiciously. He begins to suspect Draco is working for Voldemort.
recaps.7: On the train to Hogwarts, Harry sneaks into Malfoy's compartment and overhears his boasting. Malfoy catches Harry spying and hexes him.
recaps.8: Classes begin, and Slughorn takes Harry into his Slug Club. Snape finally becomes Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher.
recaps.9: Harry finds an old Potions textbook full of helpful notes signed 'The Half-Blood Prince.' He uses the tips to excel in class.
recaps.10: Dumbledore gives Harry private lessons exploring Voldemort's past through memories. Harry begins to see how Voldemort grew into a dark wizard.
recaps.11: Harry suspects Draco of plotting something dangerous. He starts keeping an eye on Malfoy around school.
recaps.12: Romantic tensions brew among students. Ginny dates Dean, Ron dates Lavender, and jealousy surfaces everywhere.
recaps.13: Harry and Dumbledore view more memories of Voldemort's youth, piecing together his quest for power. A pattern begins to emerge.
recaps.14: Harry grows more obsessed with Draco's secret mission. He follows him under the Invisibility Cloak but finds little proof.
recaps.15: Ron is poisoned after drinking mead meant for Dumbledore. Harry saves him with a quick antidote.
recaps.16: Harry learns about Horcruxes in another lesson with Dumbledore. He realizes Voldemort split his soul to achieve immortality.
recaps.17: Harry convinces Slughorn to share a crucial memory about Voldemort. It reveals Voldemort made multiple Horcruxes.
recaps.18: Harry continues watching Draco and suspects he is using the Room of Requirement. Tension grows as attacks increase outside school.
recaps.19: Harry and Ginny finally get together after a Quidditch match. Their relationship blossoms quickly.
recaps.20: Dumbledore and Harry retrieve a locket Horcrux from a dangerous cave. Dumbledore weakens himself drinking a potion protecting it.
recaps.21: They return to Hogwarts and find the Dark Mark above the Astronomy Tower. Harry hides as Draco confronts Dumbledore.
recaps.22: Snape kills Dumbledore during the confrontation, shocking everyone. Death Eaters flee the castle.
recaps.23: The Hogwarts community mourns Dumbledore's death. Harry vows to continue the mission to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes.
recaps.24: Harry breaks up with Ginny to protect her. He, Ron, and Hermione plan to leave school to hunt Horcruxes instead of returning next year.
recaps.25: Funeral preparations begin for Dumbledore. Wizards from across the world arrive to pay respects.
recaps.26: Harry discovers the locket they retrieved was fake. A note from R.A.B. reveals someone else tried to destroy the real Horcrux.
recaps.27: The funeral takes place by the lake. Harry watches as Dumbledore is laid to rest in a white tomb.
recaps.28: Harry searches Dumbledore's office for clues. He finds nothing but feels the weight of continuing alone.
recaps.29: Students pack to leave Hogwarts early. The future of the school remains uncertain without Dumbledore.
recaps.30: Harry, Ron, and Hermione solidify their plans. They will hunt for Horcruxes together, starting with finding R.A.B.'s identity.
